entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 1:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.9°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
